data.name: Climb Human
data.detailed_description:
This is an easy and funny sand sculpture game.
Each level will provide a new environment for players to explore.
Of course, the dreamer's soft body and rocking movements don't make things easy. Whether it's jumping, climbing, loading or rocking, it's easy to get worse - very funny results.
If the soft little man grabs the rope, his hand slips, his judgment of space is wrong, he jumps wrong, or he is even pushed down from the edge of the cliff by his close teammates Don't be afraid: he will just fall back into the dream and be ready to try again and again.
data.about_the_game:
This is an easy and funny sand sculpture game.
Each level will provide a new environment for players to explore.
Of course, the dreamer's soft body and rocking movements don't make things easy. Whether it's jumping, climbing, loading or rocking, it's easy to get worse - very funny results.
If the soft little man grabs the rope, his hand slips, his judgment of space is wrong, he jumps wrong, or he is even pushed down from the edge of the cliff by his close teammates Don't be afraid: he will just fall back into the dream and be ready to try again and again.
data.short_description: Enter each scene, constantly climb to the highest point of the scene, find food to supplement energy, and go to the next scene.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 10 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 10 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9 and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9 and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3225 3.3ghz​
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 680 (2GB), 2GB AMD R9 285 (GCN 3rd Gen and above) or better​ (See notes for more details)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600k
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
